entry.title: 3M VHB GPH-110GF-12X33 - VHB 110GF- Grey, 1.1 mm, 12 mm x 33 m 7100099836
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: VHB Tapes
Price: 38.56

[shortdesc]

3M VHB General Purpose High Temperature Tape, GPH-110GF, grey, 1.1 mm, 12 mm x 33 m

  • The 3M VHB General Purpose High Temperature Tape Series is a grey, conformable double-coated acrylic foam tape
  • Its high temperature performance enable bonding of materials in applications with high operating temperatures, such as prior to processing in a powder coating line
  • This tape's ability to bond to a wide variety of substrates makes it an excellent solution for multi material bonding
  • Those substrates have a high or medium surface energy, including many metals (e.g
  • stainless steel) and plastics (e.g
  • Polyamide, PMMA, ABS)
  • 3M VHB General Purpose High Temperature Tape is available in three different thicknesses, and has a red siliconised polyethelene film.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line VHB
    Backing Material Acrylic Foam
    Color Grey
    Length 36yds
    Width 1/2 Inch
    Material GPH
    Origin Country Germany
    Product Type VHB Tapes

    Product Information

  • High temperature performance (short term: 230° C
  • long term: 150° C)
  • High initial tack
  • Good balance of high temperature and peel & shear performance
  • Soft foam enables stress relaxation and an easy application
  • Good sealing properties
  • For indoor and outdoor use

    Material GPH-110GF

    Product Information

  • Fast and easy-to-use permanent bonding method provides high temperature strength and long-term durability

  • Grey, 45 mil (1.1 mil), acrylic adhesive with a conformable, acrylic foam core

  • Pressure sensitive adhesive bonds on contact to provide immediate handling strength
